header.description: A deferred pack aiming to improve the visuals of Minecraft
header.name: Odyssey Deferred v1.6 in-dev

modules.description: This pack stays true to Minecraft and improves upon it for stunning visuals!

subpacks.name: The default look of the pack

settings.text: ❐ Default: The normal look for Odyssey with PBR textures that are custom made for the pack.
❐ NON-PBR/Compatibility: A version of the pack that doesnt have the custom PBR but will use textures from other packs that are below Odyssey or the default PBR from regular Vibrant Visuals
